about_the_game:
Additional character pack Vol.3 "Riko & Mari + Yohane" includes the following:

1. Added playable character "Riko, Mari"
2. New story "Riko, Mari"
3. New initial charm "Nightwicked Lily, Nightwicked Mari, Fledgling Yohane"
4. New summoning card "Mirage Shield"
5. Yohane's new costume "Astrologer"

I will introduce each content.

1. Added playable character "Riko, Mari"
Two characters have become playable characters and are new!
Let's adventure the mirror world with Riko and Mari!

2. New story "Riko, Mari"
By changing the playable character, you can enjoy a new story of the two.

3. New initial charm "Nightwicked Lily, Nightwicked Mari, Fledgling Yohane"
Each character has a dedicated initial charm.
Adventure with a cute Nightwicked charm!

4. New summon card "Mirage Shield"
Yohane's summoning card "Mirage Shield" appears!
This appears only when the playable character is changed.
Play in Riko, Mari and summon Yohane!

5. Yohane's new costume "Astrologer"
Added Yohane's new costume "Astrologer".
It will be the clothes with Yohane's spirit awakening to the horoscope.
The large ribbon in various places is cute, and the atmosphere as a fortune teller is perfect.

* The additional story will be the story after the main story is completed.
Please be careful if you have not cleared the main story.

* Playable characters can be selected from "Character Change" when trying to a new mirror world from the fortune -telling hall.
If you have a challenge data, you need to challenge a new mirror world from the fortune -telling hall.

* The main story does not progress during the mirror world challenge with a playable character.

* The summoning card "Mirage Shield" appears only when playing in "Riko, Mari".
